modUpdater.changelog:
## ModUpdater 2.1.0

### New Features
- Self-update system for automatic updates
- Remote version discovery via GitHub Releases API
- Secure download with SHA-256 verification
- Atomic JAR replacement using bootstrap
- Rollback support on update failure

### Improvements
- Enhanced logging for update process
- Better error messages
- User notification dialogs

### Configuration
- Self-update enabled by default
- Configurable update checks (24h interval)
- Optional signature verification support
